snippet: Dell is said to be close to an agreement to sell itself for more than $23 billion. | Liberty Global is in talks to buy Virgin Media. | The Justice Department has filed civil charges against Standard & Poor's, the nation's biggest credit-ratings...
abstract: Dell is said to be close to an agreement to sell itself for more than $23 billion. | Liberty Global is in talks to buy Virgin Media. | The Justice Department has filed civil charges against Standard & Poor's, the nation's biggest credit-ratings agency. | Regulators scrutinizing Herbalife will have an interesting problem.
